website_summaries.verdict: Long lasting, deep color that is cruelty free and PETA certified.
pros: 8 color options help you find the perfect shade
Youngblood is 100% cruelty free and never tests on animals
Compact comes with its own mirror to make applying anywhere easy
A little goes a long way, so you need to replace this product less often
cons: These colors are bright, so a little goes a long way and can look overly vibrant if not applied correctly

customer_reviews.title: Best Blush
customer_reviews.text: This blush is a great find. It is the best I have used, ever. Good color, smooth, lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok this is the best mineral powder foundation ever and I’ve tried many
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is the best mineral powder foundation ever and I’ve tried many. It doesn’t take much so it lasts a long time. Excellent coverage. It doesn’t feel heavy on my skin. It actually gives my skin a fresh, dewy look. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: My fault not realizing before purchasing but color isn’t what I expected. Either way this comes off so easily though!! Even with my holding spray. It’s so bizarre.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Teeny Tiny - 1/10th of an Ounce
customer_reviews.text: Very small which makes it hard to brush. $11 for 1/10th of an ounce is ridiculous. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Looks better on than in pic!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite blush , I ordered this for a friend that liked the color too but will be ordering again !
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Finally a GREAT blush
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!! a soft pink peachy glow without looking like a clown. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Questant

customer_reviews.title: I love youngblood makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love youngblood makeup. I usually buy in the Portland Airport but decided to take a different route with Amazon. Came intact and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pri

customer_reviews.title: More red than expected.
customer_reviews.text: A bit redder than the photo shows. Not a great color if you have rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've been using this for about three years. It's my favorite brush on blush.
customer_reviews.author: Mel A Co

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Color is subtle and great for everyday wear. Love this makeup line due to it being lightweight and not looking caked on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love.
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect shade for a hint of rosy cheeks. It truly makes you look slightly blushed. Love. This. Product.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Giffin

customer_reviews.title: Good for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. All day wear. Perfect color for a fair redhead.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect! It was just what I was looking for. Perfect color, perfect coverage! Yes I will buy more of this line and yes I will recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Trish DeGroot

customer_reviews.title: Youngblood Pressed Mineral Blush, Sugar Plum
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little compact. Easy to put in my purse for a touchup. Also the color is great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy I found Youngblood
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I found Youngblood. I originally found it at a cosmetology school, but was super excited when I found it on Amazon. I love their pressed mineral blushes. I have several different colors and like all of them. No irritation and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Subtle and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice subtle blush color for my light skin tone. Stays on all day right where I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty blush, highly pigmented
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Youngblood product I've ever used and I'm really impressed by the performance. This blush is super soft, pigmented and blendable. The color payoff is great but requires a light hand. It's really easy to apply too much. I do wish the pan was slightly bigger so that pickup on my brush was more even. I think it'd be easier to control the amount of product being applied since my brush is much bigger than the pan.
customer_reviews.author: TickTockAliceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: This color is way more PINK than you see in ...
customer_reviews.text: This color is way more PINK than you see in the picture. It's a very bright pink blush. If you are looking for a mellow shade beware. But if you want to be all dolled up this is that kind of pink
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture and the color! I wish there were more product in this container, but a little does go a long way. It really has a very nice consistency and it's a lovely, subtle shade.
customer_reviews.author: Luvastray

customer_reviews.title: Great blush.
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand and this color. If I could keep my hands off my face, it wouldn't need to be reapplied.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ostlund

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased this product before so I knew what ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before so I knew what I was buying. For those who have not just know that it is heavily pigmented. more so than an average drugstore brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Youngblood products are easy to apply and beautiful on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Susan Laporte

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Blush was completely broken to bits when I opened it. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Black

product_meta.title: Youngblood Pressed Mineral Blush, Bashful, 3 Gram
feature_bullets: It goes on light and lasts all day to give your complexion a healthy, natural glow
Buildable coverage allows increased blend-ability for various looks
